summary: Allow setting explicit minimum/maximum zoom levels on the MapView

comments.content:
There have been numerous people who find it difficult to get the maps to limit the allowable min/max zoom levels. Normally we suggest they create an appropriate tile source. But it would be trivial for us to add a way to override the min/max zoom level and I think people will find that easier particularly if they want to limit the zoom levels in coordination with setting a limited scroll area.

See issue 398.
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/14065840/right-way-of-setting-minimum-and-maximum-zoom-level-for-osmdroid
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/6773480/android-osm-droid-set-max-zoom-level)
Issue 398 has been merged into this issue.
This has been added in r1197.
This appears to be working okay, so we can close this ticket.
